column5: CHRIS   It was really good to see you...... been along time It was just as good as seeing the show nice to see you were passing the torch to your daughters we should get together in the summer to do a fish day or whatever heres a couple for you files.  Looking forward to seeing you again  Cheers Peter

It was way cool to see you as well Peter. Yes we should get together when the nice weather stays put, I'd be up for that.  The show was awesome indeed, my daughters thoroughly enjoyed it and we'd all love to see it again.  As a side note the morning after the show I scored front row seats for Alice in Chains in Aug. Whooooo-hooooo!
I've seen Alice in Chains a few times now Chris, you won't be disappointed!

I've seen Alice in Chains a few times now Chris, you won't be disappointed!  I remember at least one of those Joey and I was envious.  Been a huge fan of AIC for a long time, front row seats will be just perfect.
bring ear plugs you are getting old and it could be to loud for your ancient ears.lol Glad you got out finally for a little fun.   Art
yep, they're great live! Seen them a couple times as well!  S.
